title: Udemy Wordpress Profit Formula Tutorial
description:
Course Description

Easy, quick 60 minute video course for newbies to WordPress web design, zero web design skills needed, you will design a simple 7 page website.

Start your own freelancer web design business and offer simple web design service for $500 no coding needed.

WordPress is great if you want to start your own online business, blog, charity website, i include 10 websites where you can get freelance web design work after you finish the course.

Follow along with me as you design the website. You watch the videos in one browser window like Chrome and create your site in another.

You will instantly learn new WordPress skills to build your own simple personal or business website 60 minutes from the end of the course.
What are the requirements?

    Hosting and a domain name cost about $15 i teach you how

What am I going to get from this course?

    Over 23 lectures and 49 mins of content!
    Install Wordpress
    know ten websites where they can find paid web design work
    how to join affiliate sites to earn money like clickbank, amazon and google adsense
    add a photo to the website
    how to navigate within WordPress
    publish the pages and blog to the world wide web
    be familiar with admin pages in WordPress
    install a theme
    set home page
    use general settings
    be familiar with reading, writing, comments
    know what permalink structure means
    use standard text editor
    use standard text editor tools
    how to view posts and pages
    learn how to create a page
    create a blog post
    delete page or post
    schedule post or page
    add a menu

What is the target audience?

    Anyone wanting to earn $500+ for creating a simple WordPress site (no coding needed)
    Anyone wanting to make money as an affiliate of Clickbank, Amazon or from Adsense adverts
    Anyone wanting a quick and easy business or personal website.
    Anyone with zero or little knowledge of the amazing easy to use WordPress
    The course is not for advanced users of Wordpress
